items.headline: Master the Fundamentals of Excel: Learn Data Management and Visualization in Hindi

Navigating the Excel Interface: Learn how to navigate through Excel's interface, including the ribbon, tabs, and menus.

objectives_summary: Master essential computer skills: Achieve proficiency in basic computer functions, file management, word processing, and internet navigation.
Accurate data entry expertise: Develop speed and accuracy in data entry techniques, ensuring minimal errors and maintaining data integrity.
Understand data entry best practices: Gain knowledge in data validation, quality control, and security measures to adhere to established guidelines.

items.title: Aprenda Access do zero ao intermediário de forma simples
items.headline: Access Passo a Passo
objectives_summary: Destaque-se na sua empresa otimizando diversas tarefas programando com banco de dados.
Você pode fazer uma renda extra fazendo programas para terceiros.
Com banco de dados Access você armazena milhares de informações e às recupera de forma clara, simples e rápida.

items.title: PowerPoint-Animation: Mandalorian Helm 3D-Effekt

visible_instructors.name: Ronny
visible_instructors.job_title: Trainer für Erwachsenenbildung und kreative Bildung

items.headline: Verwandle deine PowerPoint-Präsentationen mit 3D-Modellen in echte Hingucker!
objectives_summary: Wie man 3D-Objekte in PowerPoint 2019 einfügt und anpasst, um faszinierende Präsentationen zu erstellen.
Die Schaffung beeindruckender Animationen und Übergänge, um dein Publikum zu begeistern.
Die Verwendung von Mouseover-Effekten, um interaktive Folien zu erstellen.
